name: RiceSelect Original Couscous, 1.65 Pound (Pack of 4)
short_description: ENRICH YOUR KITCHEN with RiceSelect Couscous that steams in 5 minutes to create a naturally light and fluffy Moroccan pasta. Perfect for jazzing up soups, salads, casseroles, veggies, meat, chicken, fish and more.

HEALTHY AND TRADITIONAL: Our Traditional Couscous is Non-GMO Project Verified and Certified Kosher by Star K, making it a great addition to your pantry, no matter your dietary restrictions. Perfect for home cooks, vegans, and vegetarians alike!

DELICATE TEXTURE. DISTINGUISHED FLAVOR: Like orzo, barley and quinoa, Couscous is an ideal match for all kinds of dishes. Extremely light and fluffy pasta resemble the size and texture of small pasta, provide a nourishing bite that pairs well with savory, spicy and zesty flavors.

PASTA MADE WITH HIGH QUALITY WHEAT: Premium Couscous is made with high-quality durum wheat that contains 7 grams of protein and 4 grams of dietary fiber per serving. No preservatives or additives and low in fat, cholesterol, and sodium.

HOW TO COOK: See Back of Jar for Full Details Bring 1 cup of water to a boil, add salt and butter or olive oil, if desired. Stir in couscous quickly. Remove from heat and cover. Let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork and enjoy
Packaged in four 100% recyclable, BPA-Free 26.5-ounce jars
product_description: Product Description Get creative and bring your spontaneous brilliance to the kitchen to create an unforgettable meal with our RiceSelect Couscous. Our Moroccan Couscous makes for a delicious and vibrant pasta that will enhance any meal. Couscous is a natural pasta that's tiny and extremly light and fluffy when cooked. With origins from North Africa, this pasta resembles small balls that are made with 100% enriched durum semolina wheat. Couscous is prepared by steaming the pasta to create a light and fluffy consistency. Its versatile shape and short cook time of 5 minutes make it ideal as a stand-alone dish or paired it with any sauce, vegetable, meat, or cheese, like our Couscous & Swiss Chard Tabbouleh. For your convenience, our RiceSelect Couscous is Non-GMO Project Verified, Certified Kosher by Star K, and is packaged in a pack of 4 - 26.5-oz 100% recyclable, BPA-Free jars. RiceSelect is a registered trademark of Riviana Foods Inc. From the Manufacturer RiceSelect Royal Blend, Whole Grain Texmati Brown & Red Rice with Barley & Rye is a delicious and healthy addition to any meal. This unique blend combines Texmati Brown Rice, red rice, pearled barley, and rye berries. An enticing mixture of colors, textures, and tastes makes this all-natural blend ideal as the centerpiece on your dinner table. With a cook time of 45 minutes, this versatile grain tastes great served next to beef tenderloin, pork roast, and a variety of other meat dishes. For your convenience, the RiceSelect Royal Blend, Whole Grain Texmati Brown & Red Rice with Barley & Rye is packaged in four 28-ounce jars. From our seed to your plate, our dedication to quality can be seen and tasted. Enjoy all our conventional and organic rice products and mixes. Rethink rice!

name: RiceSelect Couscous, Moroccan-Style Wheat Couscous Pasta, Non-GMO, 26.5-Ounce Jar, (Pack of 1)
short_description: TRADITIONAL COUSCOUS: With origins in North Africa’s Maghreb region, RiceSelect Couscous resembles small pasta balls of unenriched durum semolina wheat. This wheat pasta variety steams in 5 minutes to create a naturally light and fluffy Moroccan couscous that absorbs large amounts of flavor.

VERSATILE MEALS: Raise your kitchen game with this versatile grain. This pasta side can be served as a stand-alone dish or paired with sauces, vegetables, and protein. Create a refreshing pasta salad, like couscous and Swiss chard tabbouleh, or a North African–inspired meal like roasted seven-vegetable couscous.

NON-GMO & PRESERVATIVE-FREE: Our traditional couscous has no other ingredients, so it’s low in fat, cholesterol, and sodium! It’s also Non-GMO Project Verified, Star-K Kosher, and free of preservatives and additives, so even your loved ones with dietary restrictions can enjoy its flavor.

SUSTAINABLE PACKAGING: We package all of our premium products—Texmati rice, Jasmati rice, Royal Blend rice, couscous, quinoa, and more—in our iconic BPA-free, fully recyclable jar. Check the back of the RiceSelect Couscous jar for complete cooking directions.

QUALITY FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY: From our exclusive rice varieties and rigid “inspect each grain” quality to our unique, innovative packaging, RiceSelect products are one of a kind. Each product we develop provides premium quality, taste, and texture that home cooks and the whole family will love!
product_description: Product Description Traditional Moroccan couscous is a small natural pasta that absorbs large amounts of flavor but remains extremely light and fluffy when cooked. With origins in the Maghreb region, this traditional cooked-wheat African food resembles small balls made with unenriched durum semolina wheat. Not to be confused with pearl couscous, this couscous is smaller in size and prepared by steaming. Served in our iconic transparent container, this classic couscous has a delicate texture and a distinguished flavor and is perfect for any creative culinary endeavors. We only use one ingredient—the highest-quality couscous—that is free of preservatives, additives, and GMOs. You won’t find high concentrations of fat, cholesterol, or sodium in this couscous, and it’s packaged in our completely recyclable, BPA-free jar so you can enjoy its quality with confidence. Just check out the back of the jar for complete cooking directions. There’s so much to love! Your culinary exploration begins with RiceSelect. Enjoy couscous as a stand-alone dish or pair it with sauces, vegetables, and protein. Create delicious pasta salads like couscous and Swiss chard tabbouleh, plant-based meals like vegan-chicken couscous bowls and Mediterranean salad, or even sweet treats like breakfast-cereal couscous with oranges and dates. The only limits are your palate and your creativity. Bring out your inner chef today! At RiceSelect, our philosophy is to embrace values of quality and innovation, which are essential to bringing you high-quality rice, pasta, and quinoa products. We offer some grains that are grown, milled, and packaged in the USA under internationally recognized management standards. We also offer other specialty grain products from around the world to help create unforgettable meals and improvise with different tastes and textures. Put a chef’s touch on your next recipe and take your meals to the next level with the premium quality of RiceSelect. Manufacturer Contact Information 2777 ALLEN PARKWAY HOUSTON, TX 77019

name: Al'Fez Moroccan Style Couscous - 7 oz (Pack of 6) - Durum Wheat Infused w/Exotic North African Spices, Sultana Raisins & Pine Nuts for Instant Couscous Salad - Vegan, No Artificial Flavors, Vegetarian
short_description: Authentic Moroccan Blend: Discover the warm, spiced taste of moroccan cuisine with this delicately flavored couscous; Made from durum wheat and infused with north african spices, sultana raisins, and pine nuts, it offers a fragrant, subtly sweet flavor in every bite; Ready in just 5 minutes, it’s perfect as a side dish, light meal, or couscous salad to serve with meats, vegetables, or tagines

Spiced & Nutty Grain Mix: Crafted from fine durum wheat couscous blended with sultana raisins, pine nuts, and aromatic north african spices, this mix offers a warm, subtly sweet, and nutty flavor; Enhanced with hints of cumin, paprika, and cinnamon, it delivers an authentic moroccan-style taste that pairs perfectly with grilled meats, roasted vegetables, or tagines

Versatile Serving Options: This couscous complements a wide variety of dishes with ease; Serve it as a light salad base, a hearty side for moroccan tagines or stews, or a flavorful bed for grilled meats and roasted vegetables; It can also be mixed with fresh herbs, nuts, or citrus for a refreshing twist; Its delicately spiced, nutty taste enhances moroccan food effortlessly

Suitable for Different Occasions: Perfect for everyday meals, family dinners, or relaxed gatherings, this moroccan couscous pairs beautifully with tagines, grilled meats, roasted vegetables, or warm breads; It fits easily into vegetarian or non-vegetarian meal plans, offering a wholesome and satisfying base for quick, flavorful dishes; Allergy advice: contains wheat and pine nuts

name: RiceSelect Pearl Couscous, Israeli-Style Wheat Couscous Pasta, Non-GMO, 24.5-Ounce Jar, (Pack of 1)
short_description: TRADITIONAL PEARL COUSCOUS: Pearl couscous, also traditionally known as Israeli couscous, is named for its unique shape when formed into small pasta spheres and toasted in an open-flame oven. This wheat pasta variety is easy to prepare and pair with Mediterranean or Middle Eastern flavors and cooks in 10 minutes.

VERSATILE COUSCOUS PEARLS: These grains are a great pasta side that pairs with sauces, veggies, or protein like lamb. Create a savory lentil soup or a couscous-and-vegetable Greek pasta salad with cheese, hummus, and a lemon vinaigrette. You can also use these pearls to make Moroccan-inspired meals like chicken tagine.

NON-GMO & PRESERVATIVE-FREE: Our pearled couscous has no other ingredients, so it’s low in fat, cholesterol, and sodium! It’s also Non-GMO Project Verified, Star-K Kosher, and free of preservatives and additives, so even your loved ones with dietary restrictions can enjoy its flavor.

SUSTAINABLE PACKAGING: We package all of our premium products—Texmati rice, Jasmati rice, Royal Blend rice, couscous, quinoa, and more—in our iconic BPA-free, fully recyclable jar. Check the back of our Pearl Couscous jar for complete cooking directions.

QUALITY FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY: From our exclusive rice varieties and rigid “inspect each grain” quality to our unique, innovative packaging, RiceSelect products are one of a kind. Each product we develop provides premium quality, taste, and texture that home cooks and the whole family will love!
product_description: With a delicate texture and distinguished flavor, pearl couscous, also known as Israeli couscous, is named for its unique shape when formed into small spheres and toasted in an open-flame oven. This process allows the pasta to absorb liquid without falling apart and distinguishes it from traditional Moroccan couscous and other pasta such as orzo. Served in our iconic transparent container, our RiceSelect Pearl Couscous is perfect for any creative culinary endeavors. We only use one ingredient—the highest-quality Israeli pearl couscous—that is free of preservatives, additives, and GMOs. You won’t find high concentrations of fat, cholesterol, or sodium in this couscous, and it’s packaged in our recyclable, BPA-free jar. There’s so much to love about our pearl couscous! Our pearl couscous is made from high-quality semolina wheat and is easy to prepare. Simply add to boiling water and cook for about 10 minutes. Once it’s ready, add sauce as you would with any other pasta. Use it to create tasty lentil soups or as a delicious bed for grilled or roasted fish, vegetables, or red meat. Create refreshing pasta salads, a pearl-couscous Israeli noodle bowl, or even a delicious Mediterranean salad. The only limits are your palate and creativity. Bring out your inner chef today! At RiceSelect, our philosophy is to embrace values of quality and innovation, which are essential to bringing you high-quality rice, pasta, and quinoa products. We offer some grains that are grown, milled, and packaged in the USA under internationally recognized management standards. We also offer other specialty grain products from around the world to help create unforgettable meals and improvise with different tastes and textures. Put a chef’s touch on your next recipe and take your meals to the next level with the premium quality of RiceSelect.
